query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rag_conversations` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255),
  `systemPrompt` text,
  `temperature` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 70,
  `maxTokens` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 2048,
  `messageCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `totalTokensUsed` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `isArchived` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `rag_conversations_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `rag_conversations_user_id_idx` (`userId`),
  INDEX `rag_conversations_updated_at_idx` (`updatedAt`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rag_conversations` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255),
  `systemPrompt` text,
  `temperature` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 70,
  `maxTokens` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 2048,
  `messageCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `totalTokensUsed` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `isArchived` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `rag_conversations_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `rag_conversations_user_id_idx` (`userId`),
  INDEX `rag_conversations_updated_at_idx` (`updatedAt`)
);
